actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 235 of the National Housing Act with regard to the recertification of the income of individuals receiving benefits under such section.

summary.text: Provides that mortgage assistance payments under the National Housing Act shall not be decreased if the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development finds that a decrease would produce undue hardship for the mortgagor, jeopardize the ability of the mortgagor to continue payments, and create a substantial danger of foreclosure.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 235 of the National Housing Act with regard to the recertification of the income of individuals receiving benefits under such section.
